abstract: Carl Pistorius, brother of Oscar Pistorius, double-amputee Olympic runner accused of murdering his girlfriend, is acquitted of culpable homicide in case involving death of woman in 2008 road accident.

headline.print_headline: South Africa: In Pistorius Cases, a Brother Is Cleared
headline.main: South Africa: In Pistorius Cases, a Brother Is Cleared
headline.seo: South Africa: In Pistorius Cases, a Brother Is Cleared

snippet: Carl Pistorius, the brother of Oscar Pistorius, was acquitted Tuesday of culpable homicide in a case involving the death of a woman in a road accident....
lead_paragraph: Carl Pistorius, the brother of Oscar Pistorius, was acquitted Tuesday of culpable homicide in a case involving the death of a woman in a road accident.
